verbose_text: On the other hand, the piperidine containing non benzothiophene moiety of raloxifene was unable to induce AhR transcriptional activity on its own, whereas substitution of the piperidine ring with 1-isopropylpiperazine rescued some aspects of AhR transcriptional activity.
evidence: piperidine-containing non-benzothiophene moiety of raloxifene was unable to induce AhR
